description: After an amazing day of dancing, partying, and splashing around the pool, Damian Black and Tripp Townsend snuggled tight together in Damian's parents' bed for the night. The two laid back down on the bed, over the sheets, and kissed.  Tripp worked his way down, eventually taking Damian's swelling cock between his lips.  He worked it slowly, feeling it grow bigger and harder in his mouth.  After sucking for a while, Tripp moved so the two could assume a 69 position.  They pleasured each other for a while this way.  Then Tripp took Damian from behind and put his hard dick into his ass.  It was even more exhilarating than the day before.  It felt tighter, but easier to fuck.  Experience this extremely romantic, incredibly hot morning with two gorgeous Twinks as they explore each other...again.    Enjoy!
title: My Folks Are Out, Part Two
